Key Match Events: India lost all their wickets, failing to score 1 run and resulting in a tie.
Axar Patel (33) and KL Rahul (31) scored some valuable runs.
Wanindu Hasaranga and Charith Asalanka took three wickets each.
Dunith Wellalage took two wickets, while Asitha Fernando and Akila Dananjaya clinched one wicket each.
Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka skipper Charith Asalanka won the toss and opted to bat first.
Indian skipper Rohit Sharma said that it looked like a good surface and he was fine with batting second here.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The second ODI will take place on Sunday from the same stadium in Colombo.
India and Sri Lanka had a T20I leg of the series, where India dominated, winning all three matches.
Others: India's captain Rohit Sharma plays a shot as Sri Lanka's Kusal Mendis watches during the first ODI cricket match between Sri Lanka and India in Colombo, Sri Lanka, Friday, Aug. 2, 2024.
